titleStmt.title: A judgment & condemnation of the Fifth-Monarchy-men, their late insurrection. Also, how far the guilt of that fact may justly be imputed to those that are commonly distinguished by the names of Independants, Presbyterians, Anabaptists and Quakers. Set forth in a letter to a friend. . By a moderate gentleman.

publicationStmt.date: printed in the year M DC LXI. [1661]

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
